description: This file handles setting or updating wireless network configurations, including validating SSID names, applying security settings, and updating device radio parameters based on received JSON input.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Sets device to apply configuration to a specific SSID, involving bitwise operations and device-specific setStr calls.

methods.name: valid_ssid_name
methods.description: Validates the SSID name against specific criteria, including allowed characters, length, and reserved name patterns.
